Name: Average time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Total time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Time of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE Cycle Time
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total elapsed time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled in variants where Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE appears as a starting point
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average duration of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE compared to the average duration of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE versus minimum time for Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Total time spent in Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE relative to total time spent in Request Payment within the same cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled in cases where no rejections occur
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in successful variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE in variants that end with Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time between Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in variants containing both
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE after Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time it takes Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE after the execution of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to the next approval activity (e.g., Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER, or Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER) depending on the variant path
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
